title: Scarlett Moffatt 'wanted to be married by 29' as she celebrates birthday with boyfriend Scott
text:

Scarlett Moffatt has revealed she hoped she'd be married with kids by the time she was 29 as she celebrated the last birthday of her twenties.

The former I'm A Celebrity winner was comparing her current situation to where she thought she'd be at almost 30.

"29 years old today!! It’s crazy when I was 18 I thought by the time I was 29 I’d be married, have 2 children, have all my shizz together," Scarlett told her Instagram followers.

"Am I where I thought I would be at 29? absolutely not. Is that a good thing? absolutely," she decided.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Scarlett made the comments as she uploaded a picture of her tucking into a tasty looking desert on a lavish holiday to Venice.

The ex Gogglebox star went on to give some advice to her two million followers.

"If I can pass any wisdom on in my old age is that it’s a great thing having no particular path as you can take any path or opportunity that comes your way. And embrace the changes that happen in your life, you might think you are not where you are meant to be, but the chances are YOU ARE EXACTLY WHERE YOUR MEANT TO BE! Life is far too important to take seriously, be happy and care less," she said.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Channel 4)

While she may not have achieved her life goal of being married, Scarlett is in a serious relationship with policeman Scott Dobinson.

The pair began dating in December last year after they were introduced through a mutual friend.

Notoriously unlucky-in-love Scarlett went Instagram official with Scott in March this year with a picture of them looking very cosy.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Scarlett split from personal trainer Lee Wilkinson a few months before amid allegations he cheated.

The former queen of the jungle took to social media to slam 'cheating pathological liar' and posted a cryptic message referencing Henry VIII - who had six wives.

She said: 'Just always seem to choose cheating pathological liars... I just choose lying cheats it's a skill.

"For anyone that needs this right now, I just want to say if somebody feels you're not enough for them then that isn't a reflection on you, that's a reflection on them... Unless you're Henry VIII, then one girl's normally enough."
description: The former Gogglebox star and I'm A Celebrity winner was in a reflective mood as she rang in the last year of her twenties
